about_the_game:
Mall Master - now you can design, build and manage shopping mall. Create your own successful business and make your customers happy.
Mall Master gives you the opportunity to create a happy, stress-free work environment...
of course, if you can do it.

Managing:
Be your Boss on your own, Create the Best Mall in Town,
bring more customers than ever, rebuild, and create exciting new locations and shops.

Features:
● Buy, land, and build your mall
● create different shops in your mall
● extend the possibilities of your store, bring more people to your business
● Share with other players your successes
● Employ more workers
● Mange transport
● Grow bigger and bigger like a real shopping Boss

name: Mall Master

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 10/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel i5 Quad-Core
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Sound Card: Standard / Integrated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4460 CPU @ 3.20 GHz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • Sound Card: Standard / Integrated

short_description: Mall Master - now you can design, build and manage shopping mall. Create your own successful business and make your customers happy. Mall Master gives you the opportunity to create a happy, stress-free work environment... of course, if you can do it.
